name: Slapping Simulator
description: This is my game jam entry for the Butterscotch Shenanijam. The theme for this one was "Single-Stick Slapper" so I made this first person 2D slapping game using the Godot engine. Use WASD to slap and Arrows to block incoming slaps. If you slap the enemy in a certain *secret* combo, they'll take extra damage! For the lazy who can't figure out what that combo is, you can find the source code here.
